column2: Test frequency - Prior to personal starting
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Signed off CWP
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - IFC drawings or Written approval from PAB
2.01 - Determination of the dry density/water content relationship (Heavy Compaction) for Structural fill Material

Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Atterberg limits Test Report
2.05 - Determination of the dry density/water content relationship (Heavy Compaction) GAP 65 Material
Test frequency - Source approval 3 no. tests
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - MDD Test Report
2.06 - Particle size distribution (PSD) Test for GAP 65 material

Test frequency - 
Source approval 3 no. tests then every 2000m3.
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - PSD Test Report
Test frequency - Source approval 3 no. tests
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Permeability Test Report
2.08 - Large Shear Box test for GAP 65 material (Minimum 3 normal stresses)
Method/Description - BS 1377 Part 7:1990 Test 5 Determaination of shear strength by direct shear
Test frequency - Source approval 3 no. tests
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Direct Shear Strength Test Report
3.01 - Set out extents of fill and check against design
3.02 - Ensure GPS plant have the correct model set up in machine and that a datum is available for checking

3.03 - Ensure the complete removal of all organics, topsoil, Vegetation, and roots. The depth of topsoil stripping should be adequate to eliminate all organic material, turf, and significant plant roots. Except for Fill 12 and 13 where the fill height is >=5m.
Test frequency - Immediately prior to earthworks beginning in all Fill areas except Fill 12 & 13
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Subgrade approval checksheet
3.04 - Designer witness of in-situ subgrade prior to filling
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Subgrade approval checksheet
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Subgrade approval checksheet
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Sub soil drainage ITP,
Test frequency - As outlined in MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SKT-4077
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Drill logs, borehole logs and monitoring instrumentation asbuilts.
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - checksheet
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - checksheet/ Survey Report
Test frequency - Structural Fill - 1 test per material type per earthworks zone, except where outlined in RFI0057
○ Buttress Fill - 1 test per material type per earthworks zone
○ GAP65 - 1 test per material type per structure / location
○ Cement Stabilised GAP65/ Structural Fill - 1 Test per material type per structure/ location
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
3.12 - insitu fill testing-In situ moisture content and density
Method/Description - In situ moisture content and density
Test frequency - Structural Fill - 1 test per 1 m lift per 100m length, Heavy compaction and standard compaction areas outlined in RFI00057
○ Buttress fill - 1 test per 200m length Average
○ GAP65 - 4 tests per lift per structure
○ Subsoil Drainage Back fill - 1 test per 500m3 ,
○ Cement Stabilised GAP65 - 4 Tests per 0.5m lift per structure
○ Cement Stabilised Structural fill - 1 test per 0.5m lift per 100m length
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
3.13 - insitu fill testing- Undrained shear Strength
Test frequency - Structural fill - 1 test per layer per 1000m2
○ Buttress Fill - 1 Test per layer per 2000m2
○ Cement Stabilised Structural Fill - 1 test per layer per 500m2
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - test report
3.14 - In-situ moisture content and density (and/ or air voids) testing of compacted for fill material Subgrade
Method/Description - in situ moisture content and density (and/ or air voids) testing of compacted fill material
Test frequency - Fill 12 & 13 - 1 test per 0.5m lift per 50m length for 1.0m subgrade depth
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
3.15 - Carry out deflection testing (either Benkelman Beam or FWD) at the subgrade
Method/Description - Benkelman beam or FWD Testing

Test frequency - 10m interval in each wheel path
at the following levels:
1) 1.0m below Subgrade Formation Level
2) 0.5m below Subgrade Formation Level
3) At Subgrade Formation Level
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
3.16 - Laboratory Soaked CBR testing for Subgrade Fill
Test frequency - Test per 5000m2 at subgrade formation level
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Test frequency - During construction and at end
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - monitoring Data tables
Test frequency - During construction and at end
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - CAD files
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Red pen mark ups
